channel.title: Minecraft
channel.description: ive been hearing about this "minecraft" lately, is it fun? so i checked some videos on it, and im thinking about buying it.. should i?

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yes, but he didn’t mention playing multiplayer. If you just stick with building shelter, you’ll soon get bored and have nothing to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:28, topic:376007”]Alot of people seem to be failing to get the point, which is to build huge structures to increase the size of your penis and NOT to build shelter in case of attack at night.[/quote]The current server mode is survival. Which means that your purpose to start out with is: survive. Once you’ve got your main shelter set up, you can move on to bigger structures.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:22, topic:376007”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=471940.msg3454260#msg3454260 date=1293943120]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=471940.msg3454188#msg3454188 date=1293940563]

[quote author=kingman002 link=topic=471940.msg3454173#msg3454173 date=1293939898]

i seen sum guy on youtube playing it and it looks stupid to me, im not gonna try it
[/quote]ofc someone as stupid as yourself would take appearance > gameplay.

ive also read how you just build stuff and at night you get attacked, it doesn’t seem like a game i would like so stfu
[/quote]Go back to that pathetic game RuneScape then? Minecraft’s crafting system rapes the whole RS up the ass literally.

runescape sucks
minecraft looks stupid IMO

[/quote]Yes it does. Though looks has nothing against the gameplay. The gameplay is amazing.[/quote]
i just fail to see how its fun… like this one computer game plants vs zombies my friend bought, i was like ths looks stupid, i tried it and it is stupid

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:9, topic:376007”]My suggestion: Don’t waste your time. I honestly fail to see how people think this game is good.

From what I’ve read it’s waste hours of your life building some fort, night comes, something attacks, and you repeat the cycle.
I’d honestly rather play 2l or RS than this shit.

But hey… it’s personal opinion, I don’t really care. I have to remember most of you enjoy sitting at home all day and this is your kind of life.[/quote]

lol, more than what you just said… people like building and obviously, if the guy is so successful, doesn’t that make you think “its not boring”.

Read full topic

soo one of the exploding cactus’s fucked my day up, I have no idea where I was building whats my recourse.

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

My suggestion: Don’t waste your time. I honestly fail to see how people think this game is good.

From what I’ve read it’s waste hours of your life building some fort, night comes, something attacks, and you repeat the cycle.
I’d honestly rather play 2l or RS than this shit.

But hey… it’s personal opinion, I don’t really care. I have to remember most of you enjoy sitting at home all day and this is your kind of life.

Read full topic

Ix Soulcist xI:

I don’t even know were to get the free version unless that’s what TabbyKiller posted, I was kind of confused about that thread. 0.0

Its not the ‘free’ version, the actual free version is Minecraft Classic. Its just the files needed to be able to play offline.
